member.name: M:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.CaptchaClient.DescribeCaptchaResult(TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to query the result of CAPTCHA ticket verification (web and app).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.CaptchaClient.DescribeCaptchaResultSync(TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to query the result of CAPTCHA ticket verification (web and app).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.CaptchaType
member.summary: It must be `9` here. You can configure the CAPTCHA types in the console.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.Ticket
member.summary: The user verification ticket returned by the frontend callback function

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.UserIp
member.summary: The user public IP obtained from the customer backend server

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.Randstr
member.summary: A random string returned by the frontend callback function

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.CaptchaAppId
member.summary: CAPTCHA's app ID. Log in to the [Captcha console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/captcha/graphical) and you can view the CaptchaAppId in the "Key" column of the CAPTCHA list.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.AppSecretKey
member.summary: CAPTCHA's app key. Log in to the [Captcha console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/captcha/graphical) and you can view the AppSecretKey in the "Key" column of the CAPTCHA list. AppSecretKey is the key for CAPTCHA ticket verification performed by the server. Please keep it confidential and do not disclose it to any third parties.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.BusinessId
member.summary: Business ID, which is used to differentiate statistical data when this service is used in multiple businesses of a website or an app.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.SceneId
member.summary: Scenario ID, which is used to differentiate statistical data when this service is used in multiple scenarios of a website or an app.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.MacAddress
member.summary: MAC address or unique identifier of a device

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.Imei
member.summary: Mobile equipment identity number

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.NeedGetCaptchaTime
member.summary: Indicates whether to return the time when the frontend obtains the CAPTCHA. Valid values: 1 (return the time) and others.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultResponse.CaptchaMsg
member.summary: Status description and verification error message Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value was found.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultResponse.EvilLevel
member.summary: This parameter returns the result of imperceptible verification. This parameter is not available for Tencent Cloud International yet. `0`: The request is trusted. `100`: The request is malicious. Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value was found.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultResponse.GetCaptchaTime
member.summary: The timestamp when the frontend obtains the CAPTCHA. Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value was found.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Captcha.V20190722.Models.DescribeCaptchaResultResponse.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.
